dmca.title: Microsoft Corporation - Cease and Desist re: hosting of certsplanet.com
dmca.body:
From: Brian C. Roche [mailto:broche@rochepia.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, February 27, 2007 9:41 AM
To: Copyright; Legal
Cc: 'Gerald Pia'
Subject: re: Microsoft Corporation - Cease and Desist re: hosting of
certsplanet.com

 

Dear Sir or Madam:

Please see the attached correspondence on behalf of Microsoft
Corporation.  We look forward to your prompt attention and cooperation
regarding this important matter.


Sincerely,

 

Brian C. Roche, Esq.

Roche Pia  LLC

Two Corporate Drive, Suite 234

Shelton, CT 06484

Tel:  203.944.0235

Fax: 203.225.1244

www.rochepia.com <http://www.rochepia.com/> 

 

This transmittal may be a confidential attorney-client communication or
may otherwise be privileged or confidential. If it is not clear that you
are the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that you have
received this transmittal in error; any review, dissemination,
distribution or copying of this transmittal is strictly prohibited. If
you suspect that you have received this communication in error, please
notify us immediately by telephone at 203.944.0235, or e-mail at
info@rochepia.com and immediately delete this message and all its
attachments.
